testcase.name: Add the items to cart
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the chrome browser and I navigate to the url "https://saucedemo.com".passed When I enter the username "standard_user" and enter the password "secret_sauce".passed And I click on login........................................................passed And I add the items to the cart.............................................passed Then I verify items is added to the cart....................................passed

testcase.name: Valid Login Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the chrome browser and I navigate to the url "https://saucedemo.com".passed When I enter the username "standard_user" and enter the password "secret_sauce".passed And I click on login........................................................passed Then I am logged in Successfully............................................passed

testcase.name: InValid Login Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the chrome browser and I navigate to the url "https://saucedemo.com".passed When I enter the username "username1" and enter the password "password1"....passed And I click on login........................................................passed Then error message is displayed.............................................passed
